question: What part of the motherboard is the processor placed on?
options: The processor is placed on the CPU socket of the motherboard.
The processor is placed near the RAM slots of the motherboard.
The processor is placed on the rear panel of the motherboard.
The processor is placed in the chipset area of the motherboard.
The processor is placed on the power connector of the motherboard.
